alert.note: Alert for Dougherty; Lee; Terrell; Turner; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 3:08PM EDT until September 07 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Dougherty County in southwestern Georgia... Northwestern Turner County in south central Georgia... Lee County in southwestern Georgia... Southeastern Terrell County in southwestern Georgia... Northwestern Worth County in south central Georgia... * Until 400 PM EDT. * At 308 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles west of Arabi to near Leesburg, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Leesburg, Albany, Turner City, Warwick, Stocks, Forrester, Palmyra, Century, Sibley, Jordan Place, Starksville, Byne Crossroads, Armena, Philema, Dakota, Doles, Mossy Dell, and Oakfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging wind, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
